title: Shorties
tagline: A url shortening service... with ATTITUDE!
description: Every highlight needs it's own personal shadow. Mountains are so simple, they're hard. We'll take a little bit of Van Dyke Brown. Working it up and down, back and forth. Decide where your cloud lives. Maybe he lives right in here. I'm going to mix up a little color. Weâ€™ll use Van Dyke Brown, Permanent Red, and a little bit of Prussian Blue. Get tough with it, get strong. Let's make some happy little clouds in our world.
